content:
UT will have a new associate vice chancellor for academic affairs and dean

of undergraduate academic affairs starting Jan PERIOD  PERIOD Linda Maxson will leave

her position as head of biology at Penn State University to take the

position at UT PERIOD

 John Peters vice chancellor for academic

affairs said PERIOD 

Her major responsibilities will be working with the deans of the colleges

coordinating the academic life of the students and chairing the

undergraduate council PERIOD She will also work closely with the honors program

the learning research center student government leaders the dean of

students and career planning and placement PERIOD She will coordinate and improve

advising and work with transfer students PERIOD

 Peters said PERIOD

Other responsibilities for Maxson include faculty development and reviewing

tenure and promotion standards for faculty PERIOD

Maxson was chosen from over  applicants PERIOD There were ten to  finalists

all with good attributes according to Peters PERIOD

 Peters said PERIOD

The change from Penn State University to UT will have some significant

differences but will in some parts remain the same PERIOD

 Maxson said PERIOD

Maxson and her husband do research in biology as well as administration PERIOD

She plans to continue her research once she comes to UT although her

students will remain at Penn State PERIOD



Her research has slowed down lately as her responsibilities in

administration increased PERIOD

 she

said PERIOD

Maxson has visited Tennessee a couple of times and said she was

impressed PERIOD



she said PERIOD

Maxsons son is a student at the University of Illinois at

UrbanaChampaign PERIOD Her husband is moving to Knoxville with her to continue

their research PERIOD
